agent_utterance: You're in a hot, busy Tuesday afternoon in Suwon. Let’s aim a tiny, doable target: log one eating moment today (now or within the next hour) and complete one micro-step. Choose one: (a) drink a tall glass of water, (b) do 2 minutes of deep breathing or a quick body check, or (c) have a small cooling snack like sliced apple or cucumber. If a slip happens, offer yourself a kind moment, log it later, and reset with your next micro-step.

agent_utterance: Nice work logging and choosing a 2-minute breathing reset. Try this simple 2-minute flow now: inhale through the nose for 4 seconds, pause for 2 seconds, exhale through the mouth for 6 seconds; repeat for 2 minutes. As you breathe, scan your body from head to toe and soften any tension. After the breath, rate your urge on a 0-10 scale and decide your next micro-step (log again, sip water, or have a tiny cooling snack if you're hungry). You’re doing well in this hot afternoon—be kind to yourself if a slip happens and reset with your next micro-step.
